title: Cobb PSA A Green and Red Portraits For Sale
author: Herpolsheimer

posts.post_title: Cobb PSA A Green and Red Portraits For Sale
posts.post_content:
I have both Cobb Portraits listed for sale on eBay.  The Red was labelled as trimmed by PSA.  The Green was labelled as altered (though I requested trimmed as I think the top left looks funny).  Both have great resolution, vibrant colors, and great centering.  I am open to offers on these cards from NET54 Members.  $2000+ for the Red and $4500+ for the Green.  I am also willing to trade.  Right Now I am into T3s and T204s....

Cobb Red Portrait PSA A:

[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/153692045703[/url]

Cobb Green Portrait PSA A:

[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/163919557126[/url]
